item.description:
@lol_range01 wrote:

in the client.java i tryed to add a commant but it didnt work so i completely deleted all i added i even checked twise and when i did compile thing it showed that i got 100 errors

and another question

i have added

spawn = 29 3254 3430 0 3254 3430 3254 3430 1 chuk - welcome

in autospawn.cfg

and

            if (npcs.npcType == 29) {
              if (misc.random2(15) == 1) {
                 npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
                 npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
                 npcs[i].textUpdate = "Welcome.";
              }
           }

in NPCHandler.java

like 2 days ago and had no errors but in the game the npc ave created is there but hes not saying welcome i want him to say
